typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ValidatedPricePointCode@ValidPricePointCode lookup(Asset_ID == Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidIncidentType@ValidIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB split(not(isNull(Price_Point_Code)) && trim(Price_Point_Code) != '',
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedPricePointCode@(ValidPricePointCode, InvalidPricePointCode)
InvalidPricePointCodeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidPricePointCode
ValidatedPricePointCode@InvalidPricePointCode derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Price Pint Code")) ~> InvalidPricePointCodeerrormessage
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidPricePointCode, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidIncidentType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset lookup(Incident_Type_Code == Incident_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalIncidentType
LookupRelationalIncidentType split(not(isNull(Incident_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidIncidentType@(ValidIncidentType, InvalidIncidentType)
IsValidIncidentType@InvalidIncidentType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Incident Type Code")) ~> InvalidIncidentTypeerrormessage
InvalidIncidentTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidIncidentType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
